俄式三弦琴 (Balalaika) 又译做巴拉莱卡,俄式三角琴俄式三弦琴是一种只有三条弦的俄罗斯民间鲁特琴。它的琴颈细长并带有品丝。俄式三弦琴非常特别的三角形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Russian, of Tartar origin

means.word_mean: 1. a stringed instrument that has triangular body and three strings

auth_sentence.content: Similar in construction to a guitar, the balalaika has a unique triangular shape.
auth_sentence.res_content: Similar in construction to a guitar, the balalaika has a unique triangular shape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Similar in construction to a guitar, the balalaika has a unique triangular shape.

auth_sentence.content: The balalaika, while not dying out completely, did become limited to the folk music only of the very poorest of peasants.
auth_sentence.res_content: The balalaika, while not dying out completely, did become limited to the folk music only of the very poorest of peasants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The balalaika, while not dying out completely, did become limited to the folk music only of the very poorest of peasants.

auth_sentence.content: Over the years, many balalaika players have emigrated from Russia, taking their instruments and their music with them.
